summary: No new characters or connections in this chapter.
summary_short: Alyosha Karamazov is the most connected figure (63 ties).
highlights: Most central: Alyosha Karamazov (63), Dmitri Karamazov (58), Fyodor Karamazov (36), Ivan Karamazov (31)
story_summary: Mitya sneaks into Fyodor Pavlovitch’s garden and watches him alone in his bedroom, growing furious and eventually striking a man with a brass pestle. The man, Grigory, wakes up, tries to stop Mitya, but falls bleeding from the blow. Mitya then flees the scene and rushes to the widow Morozov’s house, only to learn that Agrafena Alexandrovna has left with Timofey to Mokroe.
evidence_quotes: He leapt from the fence into the garden.
Grigory cried out, beside himself, pounced on him.
